Uses of Class
simplenlg.framework.PhraseElement

  • Packages that use PhraseElement 
    Package Description
    simplenlg.phrasespec  
    simplenlg.syntax
    The syntax package contains the processing module that handles the syntax in the SimpleNLG package.
    simplenlg.xmlrealiser  

    • Uses of PhraseElement in simplenlg.phrasespec

      Subclasses of PhraseElement in simplenlg.phrasespec 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdjPhraseSpec
      This class defines a adjective phrase.
      class  AdvPhraseSpec
      This class defines a adverbial phrase.
      class  NPPhraseSpec
      This class defines a noun phrase.
      class  PPPhraseSpec
      This class defines a prepositional phrase.
      class  SPhraseSpec
      This class defines a clause (sentence-like phrase).
      class  VPPhraseSpec
      This class defines a verb phrase.

    • Uses of PhraseElement in simplenlg.syntax

      Methods in simplenlg.syntax with parameters of type PhraseElement 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void ClauseHelper.addComplementiser(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement)
      Checks to see if this clause is a subordinate clause.
      protected void ClauseHelper.addCuePhrase(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement)
      Realises the cue phrase for the clause if it exists.
      protected void ClauseHelper.addDoAuxiliary(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, NLGFactory phraseFactory, ListElement realisedElement)
      Adds a do verb to the realisation of this clause.
      protected void ClauseHelper.addInterrogativeFrontModifiers(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement)
      Adds the front modifiers to the end of the clause when dealing with interrogatives.
      protected NLGElement ClauseHelper.addPassiveComplementsNumberPerson(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGElement verbElement)
      Realises the complements of passive clauses; also sets number, person for passive
      protected abstract void ClauseHelper.addPassiveSubjects(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGFactory phraseFactory)
      Realises the subjects of a passive clause.
      protected void ClauseHelper.addSubjectsToFront(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGElement splitVerb)
      Adds the subjects to the beginning of the clause unless the clause is infinitive, imperative or passive, or the subjects split the verb.
      protected abstract void ClauseHelper.checkDiscourseFunction(PhraseElement phrase)
      Checks the discourse function of the clause and alters the form of the clause as necessary.
      protected abstract void ClauseHelper.checkSubjectNumberPerson(PhraseElement phrase, NLGElement verbElement)
      Checks the subjects of the phrase to determine if there is more than one subject.
      protected void ClauseHelper.copyFrontModifiers(PhraseElement phrase, NLGElement verbElement)
      Copies the front modifiers of the clause to the list of post-modifiers of the verb only if the phrase has infinitive form.
      protected abstract NLGElement NounPhraseHelper.createPronoun(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      Creates the appropriate pronoun if the subject of the noun phrase is pronominal.
      protected abstract Stack<NLGElement> VerbPhraseHelper.createVerbGroup(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      Creates a stack of verbs for the verb phrase.
      protected NumberAgreement VerbPhraseHelper.determineNumber(NLGElement parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      Determines the number agreement for the phrase ensuring that any number agreement on the parent element is inherited by the phrase.
      protected NLGElement VerbPhraseHelper.grabHeadVerb(PhraseElement phrase, Tense tenseValue, boolean hasModal)
      Grabs the head verb of the verb phrase and sets it to future tense if the phrase is future tense.
      boolean PhraseHelper.isExpletiveSubject(PhraseElement phrase)
      Determines if the given phrase has an expletive as a subject.
      protected NLGElement VerbPhraseHelper.pushIfModal(boolean hasModal, PhraseElement phrase, NLGElement frontVG, Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
      Pushes the front verb on to the stack if the phrase has a modal.
      protected void VerbPhraseHelper.pushModal(String actualModal, PhraseElement phrase, Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
      Pushes the modal onto the stack of verb components.
      protected void VerbPhraseHelper.pushParticles(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, Stack<NLGElement> vgComponents)
      Pushes the particles of the main verb onto the verb group stack.
      NLGElement PhraseHelper.realise(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      The main method for realising phrases.
      NLGElement VerbPhraseHelper.realise(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      The main method for realising verb phrases.
      NLGElement NounPhraseHelper.realise(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      The main method for realising noun phrases.
      abstract NLGElement ClauseHelper.realise(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase)
      The main method for controlling the syntax realisation of clauses.
      protected abstract void VerbPhraseHelper.realiseComplements(SyntaxProcessor parent, PhraseElement phrase, ListElement realisedElement)
      Realises the complements of this phrase.
      protected abstract NLGElement ClauseHelper.realiseInterrogative(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGFactory phraseFactory, NLGElement verbElement)
      This is the main controlling method for handling interrogative clauses.
      protected void ClauseHelper.realiseInterrogativeKeyWord(String keyWord, LexicalCategory cat, PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGFactory phraseFactory)
      Realises the key word of the interrogative.
      protected abstract NLGElement ClauseHelper.realiseObjectWHInterrogative(String keyword, PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGFactory phraseFactory)
      Controls the realisation of wh object questions.
      protected abstract void NounPhraseHelper.realisePostModifiers(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement)
      Realises the post-modifiers of the noun phrase.
      protected ListElement ClauseHelper.realiseSubjects(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent)
      Realises the subjects for the clause.
      protected abstract void ClauseHelper.realiseVerb(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, ListElement realisedElement, NLGElement splitVerb, NLGElement verbElement, boolean whObj)
      Realises the verb part of the clause.
      protected abstract NLGElement ClauseHelper.realiseYesNo(PhraseElement phrase, SyntaxProcessor parent, NLGElement verbElement, NLGFactory phraseFactory, ListElement realisedElement)
      Performs the realisation for YES/NO types of questions.
      protected void ClauseHelper.setVerbFeatures(PhraseElement phrase, NLGElement verbElement)
      Ensures that the verb inherits the features from the clause.

      Unwrap the common phrase components (premodifiers, postmodifiers etc) that any simplenlg.xmlrealiser.wrapper.NLGElement can have, and map it to a simplenlg.framework.NLGElement
